languages.text: "//По статистически удачному совпадению фактов//милости Омниссии// он сохранил достаточную дееспособность, чтобы поместить себя в священную боевую упряжь модели Голиаф, сохранившую его //жизненные функции//работоспособность//. Сведения в архивную запись под личной инфопечатью капитана корабля — идентификатор засекречен".

"//Owing to a statistically fortunate coincidence//By the Omnissiah's grace//, enough of his operational capacity was preserved for him to don a Goliath model sacred battle harness, which would preserve his //vital functions//functionality//. Archive entry personally data-sealed by the captain of the — identifier classified."
languages.original_text: "//По статистически удачному совпадению фактов//милости Омниссии// он сохранил достаточную дееспособность, чтобы поместить себя в священную боевую упряжь модели Голиаф, сохранившую его //жизненные функции//работоспособность//. Сведения в архивную запись под личной инфопечатью капитана корабля — идентификатор засекречен".

Archive entry personally data-sealed by the captain of the — identifier classified."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: 「//統計的に幸運な偶然のおかげで//万機神の恩寵により//彼がゴライアスモデルの聖戦ハーネスを身につけるのに十分な操作能力が保存され、これにより彼の//生体機能//機能性//が保存された。識別子極秘の…の中隊長により個人的に封印されたデータをアーカイブに保管せよ」
languages.original_text: "//Owing to a statistically fortunate coincidence//By the Omnissiah's grace//, enough of his operational capacity was preserved for him to don a Goliath model sacred battle harness, which would preserve his //vital functions//functionality//. Archive entry personally data-sealed by the captain of the — identifier classified."

traits.locale_text: 「//統計的に幸運な偶然のおかげで//万機神の恩寵により//彼がゴライアスモデルの聖戦ハーネスを身につけるのに十分な操作能力が保存され、これにより彼の//生体機能//機能性//が保存された。識別子極秘の…の中隊長により個人的に封印されたデータをアーカイブに保管せよ」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “//由于统计学层面的幸运巧合//由于欧姆尼塞亚的恩典//，他依然保留着行动能力。因此，他穿上了歌利亚级神圣战斗装备，这套盔甲会暴露他的//重要功能//功能性//。此档案由舰长亲自盖章——身份识别代码保密。”
languages.original_text: "//Owing to a statistically fortunate coincidence//By the Omnissiah's grace//, enough of his operational capacity was preserved for him to don a Goliath model sacred battle harness, which would preserve his //vital functions//functionality//. Archive entry personally data-sealed by the captain of the — identifier classified."

traits.locale_text: “由于统计学层面的幸运巧合//由于欧姆尼塞亚的恩典，他依然保留着行动能力。因此，他穿上了歌利亚级神圣战斗装备，这套盔甲会暴露他的//重要功能//功能性//。此档案由舰长亲自盖章——身份识别代码保密。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "//Aufgrund eines statistisch günstigen Zufalls//Durch die Gnade des Omnissiah// konnte genügend Operationskapazität bewahrt werden, um eine heilige Kampfpanzerung der Goliath-Reihe anzulegen, die seine //Vitalfunktionen//Funktionalität// erhielt. Archiveintrag persönlich datenversiegelt durch den Captain der – Identifikator geheim."
languages.original_text: "//Owing to a statistically fortunate coincidence//By the Omnissiah's grace//, enough of his operational capacity was preserved for him to don a Goliath model sacred battle harness, which would preserve his //vital functions//functionality//. Archive entry personally data-sealed by the captain of the — identifier classified."

traits.locale_text: "//Aufgrund eines statistisch günstigen Zufalls//Durch die Gnade des Omnissiah// konnte genügend Operationskapazität bewahrt werden, um eine heilige Kampfpanzerung der Goliath-Reihe anzulegen, die seine //Vitalfunktionen//Funktionalität// erhielt. Archiveintrag persönlich datenversiegelt durch den Captain der – Identifikator geheim."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « //En raison d'un heureux hasard statistique//Par la grâce de l'Omnimessie//, ses capacités opérationnelles ont été suffisamment préservées pour qu'il endosse un harnois de guerre sacré modèle Goliath permettant de prolonger ses //fonctions vitales//opérations//. Extrait d'archives frappé du sceau personnel du capitaine du vaisseau... matricule classé confidentiel. »
languages.original_text: "//Owing to a statistically fortunate coincidence//By the Omnissiah's grace//, enough of his operational capacity was preserved for him to don a Goliath model sacred battle harness, which would preserve his //vital functions//functionality//. Archive entry personally data-sealed by the captain of the — identifier classified."

traits.locale_text: « En raison d'un heureux hasard statistique/Par la grâce de l'Omnimessie, ses capacités opérationnelles ont été suffisamment préservées pour qu'il endosse un harnois de guerre sacré modèle Goliath permettant de prolonger ses //fonctions vitales//opérations//. Extrait d'archives frappé du sceau personnel du capitaine du vaisseau... matricule classé confidentiel. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «//Debido a una coincidencia estadísticamente afortunada//Por la gracia del Omnissiah//, conservó una parte lo bastante sustanciosa de su capacidad operativa como para equiparse con un sagrado arnés de combate modelo Goliath, el cual preservaría sus //funciones vitales//funcionalidades//. Los datos de esta entrada del archivo han sido sellados personalmente por el capitán de la — identificación clasificada».
languages.original_text: "//Owing to a statistically fortunate coincidence//By the Omnissiah's grace//, enough of his operational capacity was preserved for him to don a Goliath model sacred battle harness, which would preserve his //vital functions//functionality//. Archive entry personally data-sealed by the captain of the — identifier classified."

traits.locale_text: «Debido a una coincidencia estadísticamente afortunada/Por la gracia del Omnissiah, conservó una parte lo bastante sustanciosa de su capacidad operativa como para equiparse con un sagrado arnés de combate modelo Goliath, el cual preservaría sus //funciones vitales//funcionalidades//. Los datos de esta entrada del archivo han sido sellados personalmente por el capitán de la — identificación clasificada».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "//Güzel bir istatistiki tesadüf//Hermesih'in merhameti// sayesinde operasyonel kapasitesinin yeterli kısmı, Golyat modeli kutsal bir savaş giysisi kuşanabilecek kadar korunmuştur. Bu sayede de //hayati fonksiyonlarını//işlevselliğini// kaybetmemiştir. Arşiv girdisi veri mührü — kimlik bilgileri gizlidir — kaptanı tarafından bizzat basılmıştır."
languages.original_text: "//Owing to a statistically fortunate coincidence//By the Omnissiah's grace//, enough of his operational capacity was preserved for him to don a Goliath model sacred battle harness, which would preserve his //vital functions//functionality//. Archive entry personally data-sealed by the captain of the — identifier classified."

traits.locale_text: "//İstatistiksel olarak şanslı bir tesadüf//Hermesih'in merhameti// sayesinde operasyonel kapasitesinin yeterli kısmı, Golyat modeli kutsal bir savaş giysisi kuşanabilecek kadar korunmuş, bu sayede de //hayati fonksiyonlarını//işlevselliğini// kaybetmemiştir. Arşiv girdisi veri mührü — kimlik bilgileri gizlidir — kaptanı tarafından bizzat yapılmıştır."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
